bio:
I am a collector of NFT music Sound.xyz on Optimims
In Optimims we trust
contributionDescription:
I am a user and purchaser of NFT music from artists on Sound.XYZ (95% of my NFT collection is on Optimims)
For more than 4 consecutive months, I have minted 239 songs on Sound.xyz from more than 12 different artists with the hope that the above budget will be a motivation to contribute to the development of a diverse ecosystem on Optimims.
We all understand that during the downtrend season, artists releasing songs on Blockchain are very difficult to sell.
But we support each other to get through this difficult time
I am also a member of Camel venture, the leading fund in Vietnam introducing NFT music of Sound.xyz to users.
ok,let's get build together
Thanks team !
